objects.text:
• Premium 100ml Eau de Toilette
• Versatile for all occasions
• Fresh invigorating scent
• Long-lasting throughout the day

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh: Luxurious Unisex Fragrance | Refreshing Elegance in Every Spray
product_details.description:
• 💫 Premium 100ml/3.4 fl. oz Eau de Toilette formulation
• 🌟 Versatile unisex fragrance suitable for all occasions
• ✨ Sleek turquoise bottle design with elegant gold cap
• 🌊 Fresh and invigorating scent profile
• 🎁 Perfect gift choice for any gender
• 💎 Luxurious packaging and presentation
• 🌿 Modern and contemporary fragrance
• ⭐ Professional-grade perfume quality
• 🏷️ Branded BELLAVITA authentic product
• 🔆 Long-lasting fresh scent throughout the day

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and modern layout designed to promote a premium unisex fragrance product. The background consists of dynamic diagonal layering with dual-tone gradients—teal and deep navy—enhanced with abstract circles and golden accent lines for visual depth. At the top, text layer `heading` delivers the brand name in a clean, bold white font, followed by `subheading` in a contrasting gold, presenting the product name. The `tagline` reinforces the product’s luxurious appeal. Below that, `description` provides a bulleted feature list in white. `price` stands out in large golden text over a subtle gradient circle. A gold rectangular button `cta_button` with dark navy `cta` text invites action. A high-resolution product image (`product_image`) is prominently placed to the right.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy (#00171F)
- Teal Gradient (#036D6D to #05B5B5)
- Gold (#D4AF37)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and refreshing color palette that perfectly aligns with its branding. The predominant turquoise-blue (#00B5B8) evokes freshness and vitality, ideal for promoting a unisex fragrance. The gold metallic cap (#D4AF37) adds a touch of elegance and sophistication, enhancing visual appeal. White text (#FFFFFF) contrasts sharply against the turquoise background, ensuring legibility and drawing attention to key branding elements. The turquoise base subtly blends varying cyan and aqua shades to create depth without overwhelming the viewer. This harmonic blend of energizing and luxurious colors would be perfect for an advertisement banner that is clean, modern, and inviting.
